attributes.action: please stop 'The economist' to pervert the course of justice regarding the war criminals in bangladesh and publish untrue stories.
attributes.additional_details: 'The economist' once a reputed weekly magazine is publishing untrue stories and rumors about the current tribunal against the war criminals in Bangladesh.Its not only there unfounded and untrue stories but also there ways of getting the information about the tribunal itself is unethical as they have hacked 'skype' account of several acting judges.The economist is using there worldwide network to hack into 'judgement sensitive'information and publishing them online.This has to stop where a magazine within uk jurisdiction and law is helping there foreign wings to hamper the course of justice against self proclaimed war criminals.
